column3: Latest;Siem Reap:  At around 3.20 am on 28 November 2019 a French man died at his home in Siem Reap.------JEAN CHARLES FERNAND CAILLY
column8: 51.------The court doctor concluded that the victim died of a heart attack and after an examination  handed over the remains to the family for a traditional ceremony at the pagoda. ------NATIONAL POLICE
